name: Save Your Bacon HTML
description:
Save Your Bacon!

Some people think pigs can't fly, Little Pig Jeffers is out to prove them wrong!
Armed with a propeller hat and a lot of gumption, Jeffers sets to the skies.
As he's flying he notices something, an army belonging to the Circular Saws has invaded Pig City!?

Jeffers may need to use the Magic Bacon from his body to slow the onslaught, but watch out brave Jeffers! Each eaten rasher of the bacon hurts you!
The Magic Bacon rasher patrol has headed to the skies to help Jeffers in repel the attack, get them while avoiding the Circular Saw troops!
 

Controls:

W -     Move Up
S -     Move Down
Space - Pause Menu
R -     Eat Bacon (Deals 1 damage, but reduces speed by 1)
